alert.note: Alert for Greene; Hale; Marengo (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 18 at 8:54AM CST until February 22 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam affecting Greene, Hale and Marengo Counties. .Flooding continues on the Black Warrior River and a flood warning remains in effect. Another statement will be issued by late tonight, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam. * WHEN...Until early Wednesday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM CST Saturday the stage was 89.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this morning to a crest of 95.1 feet Monday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 90.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
